00023 SplashScreen::SplashScreen(QWidget* parent) : QSplashScreen(parent, QPixmap(":/graphics/splash.png"))
00024 {
00025     setWindowFlags(windowFlags() | Qt::WindowStaysOnTopHint | Qt::X11BypassWindowManagerHint);
00026 }

00035 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00036 // Function: drawContents()
00037 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00038 void SplashScreen::drawContents(QPainter *painter)
00039 {
00040     // Draw the version text.
00041     painter->setPen(QPen(Qt::white, 1));
00042     painter->drawText(300, 125, tr("Version ") + QString::number(VERSION_MAJOR) + "." +
00043         QString::number(VERSION_MINOR) + tr(" (Build ") + QString::number(VERSION_BUILDNO) + ")");
00044 
00045     // Draw the other information.
00046     painter->drawText(QRectF(270, 280, 310, 150), Qt::AlignLeft,
00047                       "This software is licensed under the GPL2 General Public License.\n"
00048                       "See license.txt for further details.\n\n"
00049                       "Contributors: Juho J‰rvinen, Antti Kamppi, Joni-Matti M‰‰tt‰,\n"
00050                       "Lauri Matilainen, Timo D. H‰m‰l‰inen\n\n"
00051                       "Kactus2 Website: http://funbase.cs.tut.fi/");
00052 }
00053 
00054 void SplashScreen::mousePressEvent( QMouseEvent* event ) {
00055         event->accept();
00056         close();
00057 }
00058 
00059 void SplashScreen::keyPressEvent(QKeyEvent* event) {
00060         event->accept();
00061         close();
00062 }
